titleStmt.title: A true relation of some remarkeable passages concerning Nottingham-shire petition and His Majesties answer also the ill usage of the Linconshire gentlmen at Yortk who delivered their petition / written from an esquire of Nottingham-shire ... and sent to his brother dwelling in London ; whereunto is added His Majesties message sent to the Parliament Aprill 8, 1642 concerning his resolution to go into Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Widmerpole, Joseph.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: The message is narrated by I. Widmerpole. Cf. BM.
"Report this from me to be a true copy of our answer there, I.W."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
